faqs.q: How many calories in a bottle red wine?
faqs.a: About 638 kcal for a standard 750 ml dry red wine.

faqs.q: Are calories in red wine from alcohol or sugar?
faqs.a: Mostly from alcohol (~7 kcal/g), with some from carbs (~2.6 g per 100 ml); dry wines have low sugars.

faqs.q: How many glasses in a bottle of red wine?
faqs.a: Typically 5 standard 150 ml pours; each ~128 kcal.
